label: Can serve AJAX requests in the rate required by the Seating functionality.
description: Your site cannot serve AJAX requests in the rate required for the Seating functionality to work as expected! ! This is a critical requirement.
actions:
Do you have any security plugins that could be enforcing a rate limit?

Ask your hosting provider why your site is not handling AJAX requests in the rate of 200 requests per second.

Read more or get help resolving this issue.
